price: 75 « Il en est ainsi parce que vous affichiez sur terre, sans aucune justification, une joie pleine d’insolence.
arabic: ذَٰلِكُم بِمَا كُنتُمۡ تَفۡرَحُونَ فِي ٱلۡأَرۡضِ بِغَيۡرِ ٱلۡحَقِّ وَبِمَا كُنتُمۡ تَمۡرَحُونَ

version.title: French Translation - Rashid Maash
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French by Rashid Maash

meta.transliteration: dhālikum bimā kuntum tafraḥūna fī al-arḍi bighayri al-ḥaqi wabimā kuntum tamraḥūna
